p: We hypothesised that RS intake would modulate the intestinal microbiota, as well as inflammation in the intestine, resulting in reduced inflammation of bone marrow and bone loss caused by oestrogen deficiency. Here, we evaluated the effect of 12% RS supplemented in a diet on the intestinal microbiota, bone mineral density (BMD), and expression of inflammatory and the genes of tight-junction proteins in the colon and bone marrow of OVX mice.
